tall.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a person, building, tree etc that is tall is a greater height than normal
tall.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: a house surrounded by tall trees
This bush grows tall very quickly.
tall.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: you use ‘tall’ to say or ask what the height of something or someone is
tall.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: She’s a little taller than her sister.
tall.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a tall drink contains a small amount of alcohol mixed with a large amount of a non-alcoholic drink
tall.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a tall organization has many levels of employment between top management and the work done at the bottom
tall.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Tall organizations are sometimes prone to problems of communication.
